entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Edmonton (Int'l Aprt)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:23 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmonton Int'l Airport 03:50 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: SSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches becoming fog late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Fog. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating near noon then cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 8. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
